Thus, Susan is an ancestor of Harold, who is an ancestor of Laura, who is an ancestor of Albert, who is an ancestor of Linda, who is an ancestor of Samuel, who is an ancestor of Kyle, who is an ancestor of Stephen, who is an ancestor of Olivia, who is an ancestor of Virginia, who is an ancestor of Denise, who is an ancestor of Martha, who is an ancestor of Terry.
